data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Baalbak - Hermel, Lebanon that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baalbak - Hermel, Lebanon
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Baalbak - Hermel, Lebanon.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Baalbak - Hermel, Lebanon.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Baalbak - Hermel.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Alawite people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Baalbak - Hermel.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Baalbak - Hermel.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Baalbak - Hermel unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Baalbak - Hermel
location.people_groups_list: Turkmen, Middle-Eastern, Arab, Iraqi, Deaf, Bedouin, Levantine, Jew, Syrian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Turkmen, Middle-Eastern (88,000), Arab, Iraqi (27,000), Deaf (34,000), Bedouin, Levantine (68,000), Jew, Syrian (2,000)
